welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cernay, France! Get ready to be charmed by this quaint town known for its beautiful scenery and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything that Cernay has to offer. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Colmar-houssen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Colmar-houssen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, but may experience slower speeds during peak hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
